# ============================= # Debloat.ps1 - Limpieza post OOBE # =============================
Write-Host "Eliminando bloatware... Esto puede tardar unos minutos."
# Eliminar apps preinstaladas comunes $apps = @( "Microsoft.XboxApp", "Microsoft.XboxGamingOverlay", "Microsoft.Xbox.TCUI", "Microsoft.ZuneMusic", "Microsoft.ZuneVideo", "Microsoft.GetHelp", "Microsoft.Getstarted", "Microsoft.Microsoft3DViewer", "Microsoft.MicrosoftOfficeHub", "Microsoft.MicrosoftSolitaireCollection", "Microsoft.People", "Microsoft.SkypeApp", "Microsoft.MSPaint", "Microsoft.Todos", "Microsoft.OneConnect", "Microsoft.YourPhone", "Microsoft.MixedReality.Portal" )
foreach ($app in $apps) { Get-AppxPackage -AllUsers -Name $app | Remove-AppxPackage -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue Get-AppxProvisionedPackage -Online | Where-Object {$_.DisplayName -eq $app} | Remove-AppxProvisionedPackage -Online -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }
# Deshabilitar telemetría básica Set-ItemProperty -Path "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\DataCollection" -Name AllowTelemetry -Value 0 -Type DWord -Force
# Desactivar tareas innecesarias Get-ScheduledTask | Where-Object {$_.TaskName -like "*Xbl*" -or $_.TaskName -like "*OneDrive*"} | Disable-ScheduledTask
Write-Host "Limpieza completa. Reiniciando..." Start-Sleep -Seconds 5 Restart-Computer
